entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Aklavik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -35.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Aklavik Airport 10:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Humidity: 69 %

Dewpoint: -38.8°C
Wind: SE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
